Gold.en: Change user's type to a move's type.

Silver.en: Change user's type to a move's type.

Crystal.en: Change user's type to a move's type.

Ruby.en: Changes the user’s type into an own move’s type.
Ruby.de: Wandelt Typ d. Anwenders in eigenen Attacken-Typ.

Sapphire.en: Changes the user’s type into an own move’s type.
Sapphire.de: Wandelt Typ d. Anwenders in eigenen Attacken-Typ.

FireRed.en: The user changes its type to match the type of one of its moves.
FireRed.de: Wandelt Elementklasse d. Anwenders in Elementklasse einer Attacke.

LeafGreen.en: The user changes its type to match the type of one of its moves.
LeafGreen.de: Wandelt Elementklasse d. Anwenders in Elementklasse einer Attacke.

Emerald.en: Changes the user’s type into a known move’s type.
Emerald.de: Wandelt Typ d. Anwenders in bekannten Attacken-Typ.

Diamond.en: The user changes its type to become the same type as one of its moves.
Diamond.de: Wandelt den Typ des Anwenders in den Typ einer Attacke.
